mapper.select: SELECT 'REG' AS SERVICE_TYPE, MASTER.REQ_ID AS TRANS_ID, MASTER.USER_ID AS CUST_NO, FACE_INFO.SELFIE_FRONT_FILE_NAME AS FRONT_IMAGE, FACE_INFO.SELFIE_LEFT_FILE_NAME AS LEFT_IMAGE, FACE_INFO.SELFIE_RIGHT_FILE_NAME AS RIGHT_IMAGE, FACE_INFO.ID_FRONT_FILE_NAME AS COMPARE_IMAGE FROM EKYC_MASTER MASTER INNER JOIN EKYC_FACE_INFO FACE_INFO ON MASTER.EKYC_FACE_INFO_ID = FACE_INFO.ID WHERE MASTER.APPL_TYPE = '01' AND MASTER.REQ_ID = #{transId}
